mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( provider, provider_id, oauth_nickname, oauth_email, oauth_profile_image, oauth_age_range, nickname, created_at, last_login_at ) VALUES ( #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{oauthNickname}, #{oauthEmail}, #{oauthProfileImage}, #{oauthAgeRange}, #{nickname}, NOW(), NOW() )
INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, 'USER', 'ACTIVE', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, provider, provider_id AS providerId, oauth_nickname AS oauthNickname, oauth_email AS oauthEmail, oauth_profile_image AS oauthProfileImage, oauth_age_range AS oauthAgeRange, nickname, created_at AS createdAt, last_login_at AS lastLoginAt FROM users WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id AS userId, role, status, ban_reason AS banReason, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = #{userId}
